Class.name: Report.INAUFP
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INAUFP.Company as INAUFP_Company,SQLUser.INPARA.Company as INPARA_Company,SQLUser.INAUFP.ItemName,SQLUser.INAUFP.ItemNumber,SQLUser.INAUFP.LineItem,SQLUser.INAUFP.QuantityUnit as UnitOfMeasure,SQLUser.INAUFP.Quantity,SQLUser.INAUFP.OrderNo as OrderNumber,SQLUser.INAUFP.ItemGroup as ItemGroupNumber,SQLUser.INPARA.ParameterName,SQLUser.INPARA.Language1,SQLUser.INPARA.SearchWord,SQLUser.INPARA.Text,SQLUser.INAUFP.CustomerText as ItemDescription,SQLUser.INAUFP.UnitLineCost,SQLUser.INAUFP.TotalLineCost,SQLUser.INAUFP.ComplaintReason,SQLUser.INAUFP.Approval1,SQLUser.INAUFP.Approval2,SQLUser.INAUFP.Approval3,SQLUser.INAUFP.Remarks,SQLUser.INAUFP.DateChanged,SQLUser.INAUFP.ChangedBy,$$UserParam^REPUtilities(SQLUser.INAUFP.Company,"VERURSACHER",Language1,SQLUser.INAUFP.ComplaintReason) as ComplaintReasonDesc,$$Enum^REPUtilities("EINHEIT",SQLUser.INPARA.Language1,SQLUser.INAUFP.QuantityUnit) as ItemUOMDesc from SQLUser.INAUFP,SQLUser.INPARA where ((INPARA.ParameterName = 'WARENGRUPPE') and (INPARA.SearchWord = INAUFP.ItemGroup))
